title: Semi-Synchronous Federated Learning Protocol With Dynamic Aggregation in Internet of Vehicles
summaries: propose __a semi-synchronous FL protocol__ to improve the performance in IoV

the protocol specifically includes [1] a vehicle selection scheme based on local computing capacity, network capacity and learning value of training samples [2] a dynamic waiting time adjustment technique [3] a dynamic asynchromous aggregation scheme
